ISSUE.TITLE: Problem with registartion new customer
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.60 If you try to register a new customer while logged in under a previously registered one, you will receive the error "Current customer is already registered"

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #6816 Fixed problem with indexed values in the nop-editor tag helper

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #6854 #5846 Fixed problem with registration new customer by already registered one
